attributes.title: Cheetos
attributes.review: I opened this app intending to learn more about our president. Instead, I was faced  with the Cheetos snapchat filter and two beady eyes behind it. Truly terrifying. I thought this app was SERIOUS. A chance for me to support the man running our country but instead Cheetos face scared me half to death and forced me to throw my phone across the room thus shattering it. If I could recommend 0 stars I would. 0/10 recommend unless you enjoy looking at Cheetos. Thereâ€™s lots of them on this app.
